description: This file defines the React component `AppNavbar`, which implements a top navigation bar with global search functionality, including a dropdown of book suggestions. It handles user interactions, navigation, and renders links and a search interface.

methods.name: AppNavbar
methods.description: Main React functional component implementing the navigation bar with search functionalities.

methods.name: toggle
methods.description: Toggles the visibility of the navigation menu.

methods.name: goToCatalogWithQuery
methods.description: Navigates to the catalog page with a search query parameter.

methods.name: goToBookDetails
methods.description: Navigates to the detail page for a specific book based on its ID.

methods.name: handleSubmit
methods.description: Handles search form submission, directing to either book details if an exact match exists or to the catalog with a query.

methods.name: onKeyDown
methods.description: Handles keyboard navigation and interactions within the search input, managing arrow keys, Enter, and Escape behavior.
